nodes.text: A flight academy was located on the Galactic Republic capital world of Coruscant early during the Clone Wars. After the outbreak of the war at the First Battle of Geonosis, CC-2237, due to his status as a Clone Commander, was given additional training in the flight academy on Coruscant, despite his Kaminoan training under their clone trooper pilot program. There, CC-2237 learned tricks and tactics, and passed them on to the pilots under his command in Clone Flight Squad Seven. This significantly improved their effectiveness.
